title: Create a new project
contents:
mode_edit

應用的外殼link

Create a new projectlink

使用 ng new 命令開始建立你的英雄之旅應用。

Use the ng new command to start creating your Tour of Heroes application.

本課程：

This tutorial:

  1. 建立你的開發環境。

    Sets up your environment.

  2. 建立一個新的工作區和初始應用專案。

    Creates a new workspace and initial application project.

  3. 啟動開發伺服器。

    Serves the application.

  4. 對新應用進行更改。

    Makes changes to the new application.

要檢視此應用的程式碼，請參閱。

To view the application's code, see the .

搭建開發環境link

Set up your environmentlink

要想搭建開發環境，請遵循搭建本地環境中的步驟進行操作。

To set up your development environment, follow the instructions in Local Environment Setup.

建立新的工作區和一個初始應用link

Create a new workspace and an initial applicationlink

Angular 的工作區就是你開發應用所在的上下文環境。一個工作區包含一個或多個專案所需的檔案。每個專案都是一組由應用、庫或端到端（e2e）測試組成的檔案集合。

You develop applications in the context of an Angular workspace. A workspace contains the files for one or more projects. A project is the set of files that make up an application or a library.

要想建立一個新的工作區和一個初始應用專案，需要：

To create a new workspace and an initial project:

  1. 確保你現在沒有位於 Angular 工作區的資料夾中。比如，如果你之前已經建立過 "快速上手" 工作區，請回到其父目錄中。

    Ensure that you aren't already in an Angular workspace directory. For example, if you're in the Getting Started workspace from an earlier exercise, navigate to its parent.

  2. 使用此應用名稱執行 ng new，如下所示：

    Run ng new followed by the application name as shown here:

    ng new angular-tour-of-heroes

  3. ng new 會提示你有關要包含在初始專案中的特性的資訊。按 Enter 或 Return 鍵接受預設值。

    ng new prompts you for information about features to include in the initial project. Accept the defaults by pressing the Enter or Return key.

ng new 命令會提示你輸入要在初始應用專案中包含哪些特性，請按 Enter 或 Return 鍵接受其預設值。

ng new 會安裝 Angular 所需的必要 npm 套件和其它依賴項。這可能需要幾分鐘。

ng new installs the necessary npm packages and other dependencies that Angular requires. This can take a few minutes.

它還會建立下列工作區和初始專案的檔案：

ng new also creates the following workspace and starter project files:

  • 新的工作區，其根目錄名叫 angular-tour-of-heroes。

    A new workspace, with a root directory named angular-tour-of-heroes

  • 一個最初的骨架應用專案，位於 src/app 子目錄下。

    An initial skeleton application project in the src/app subdirectory

  • 相關的配置檔案。

    Related configuration files

初始應用專案是一個簡單的 "歡迎" 應用，隨時可以執行它。

The initial application project contains a simple application that's ready to run.

啟動應用伺服器link

Serve the applicationlink

進入工作區目錄，並啟動這個應用。

Go to the workspace directory and launch the application.

cd angular-tour-of-heroes ng serve --open

ng serve 命令：

The ng serve command:

  • 建構本應用

    Builds the application

  • 啟動開發伺服器

    Starts the development server

  • 監聽原始檔

    Watches the source files

  • 當檔案發生變化時重新建構本應用

    Rebuilds the application as you make changes

--open 標誌會開啟瀏覽器，並存取 http://localhost:4200/。

The --open flag opens a browser to http://localhost:4200.

你會發現本應用正執行在瀏覽器中。

You should see the application running in your browser.

Angular 元件link

Angular componentslink

你所看到的這個頁面就是應用的外殼。這個外殼是被一個名叫 AppComponent 的 Angular 元件控制的。

The page you see is the application shell. The shell is controlled by an Angular component named AppComponent.

元件是 Angular 應用中的基本構成要素。它們在螢幕上顯示資料，監聽使用者輸入，並且根據這些輸入執行相應的動作。

Components are the fundamental building blocks of Angular applications. They display data on the screen, listen for user input, and take action based on that input.

修改應用標題link

Make changes to the applicationlink

用你最喜歡的編輯器或 IDE 開啟這個專案，並存取 src/app 目錄，來對這個起始應用做一些修改。

Open the project in your favorite editor or IDE. Navigate to the src/app directory to edit the starter application.

在 IDE 中，定位這些檔案，它們組成了你剛剛建立的 AppComponent：

In the IDE, locate these files, which make up the AppComponent that you just created:

檔案Files 詳情Details
app.component.ts 元件的類程式碼，這是用 TypeScript 寫的。The component class code, written in TypeScript.
app.component.html 元件的範本，這是用 HTML 寫的。The component template, written in HTML.
app.component.css 元件的私有 CSS 樣式。The component's private CSS styles.

當你執行 ng new 時，Angular 會為你的新應用建立一些測試規約。不幸的是，做這些修改會破壞這些新建立的測試規約。

When you ran ng new, Angular created test specifications for your new application. Unfortunately, making these changes breaks your newly created specifications.

這不是大問題，因為 Angular 測試是本課程範圍之外的，並且不會用到。

That won't be a problem because Angular testing is outside the scope of this tutorial and won't be used.

要學習如何用 Angular 做測試，參見測試。

To learn more about testing with Angular, see Testing.

更改應用標題link

Change the application titlelink

開啟 app.component.ts，並把 title 屬性的值修改為 'Tour of Heroes'（英雄之旅）。

Open the app.component.ts and change the title property value to 'Tour of Heroes'.

title = 'Tour of Heroes';

開啟 app.component.html 並清空 ng new 建立的預設範本。改為下列 HTML 內容。

Open app.component.html and delete the default template that ng new created. Replace it with the following line of HTML.

<h1>{{title}}</h1>

雙花括號語法是 Angular 的插值繫結語法。這個插值繫結的意思是把元件的 title 屬性的值繫結到 HTML 中的 h1 標記中。

The double curly braces are Angular's interpolation binding syntax. This interpolation binding presents the component's title property value inside the HTML header tag.

瀏覽器自動重新整理，並且顯示出了新的應用標題。

The browser refreshes and displays the new application title.

新增應用樣式link

Add application styleslink

大多數應用都會努力讓整個應用保持一致的外觀。ng new 會產生一個空白的 styles.css 檔案。你可以把全應用級別的樣式放進去。

Most apps strive for a consistent look across the application. ng new created an empty styles.css for this purpose. Put your application-wide styles there.

開啟 src/styles.css 並把下列程式碼新增到此檔案中。

Open src/styles.css and add the code below to the file.

/* Application-wide Styles */ h1 { color: #369; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 250%; } h2, h3 { color: #444; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: lighter; } body { margin: 2em; } body, input[type="text"], button { color: #333; font-family: Cambria, Georgia, serif; } button { background-color: #eee; border: none; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; color: black; font-size: 1.2rem; padding: 1rem; margin-right: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; margin-top: 1rem; } button:hover { background-color: black; color: white; } button:disabled { background-color: #eee; color: #aaa; cursor: auto; } /* everywhere else */ * { font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; }

檢視最終程式碼link

Final code reviewlink

下面是本頁所提到的原始碼。

Here are the code files discussed on this page.

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Tour of Heroes'; } <h1>{{title}}</h1> /* Application-wide Styles */ h1 { color: #369; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 250%; } h2, h3 { color: #444; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: lighter; } body { margin: 2em; } body, input[type="text"], button { color: #333; font-family: Cambria, Georgia, serif; } button { background-color: #eee; border: none; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; color: black; font-size: 1.2rem; padding: 1rem; margin-right: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; margin-top: 1rem; } button:hover { background-color: black; color: white; } button:disabled { background-color: #eee; color: #aaa; cursor: auto; } /* everywhere else */ * { font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; }

小結link

Summarylink

  • 你使用 ng new 建立了初始的應用結構

    You created the initial application structure using ng new.

  • 你學會了使用 Angular 元件來顯示資料

    You learned that Angular components display data

  • 你使用雙花括號插值顯示了應用標題

    You used the double curly braces of interpolation to display the application title

最後複查時間：2/28/2022
